Articles.Content: simple,lift the heaviest group of parts into orbit as possible. + Bonus the higher it is, double bonus if it does an appollo 8.

Pure stock vanilla, 98 kerbal tons: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=3789.msg42715#msg42715

Was awhile back during the 0.12.x versions and the stutter was so bad as to be a showstopper.

I lifted a rocket weighing 772.7 in v.10.

Each of the four boosters\' first stage alone weighed 141.5.

The numbers were too big for v.11 and .12, so I cut the component weight and thrust in half.
EDITORIAL: The Rocket must lift the load, not be it.
How about 441.5 tons to orbit using this launch stage?
Ehmmmm, that was 5 years ago.

The game has changed profoundly since this thread was created. Why not start a new challenge comparing current ships? 

Closing now.
